body: Poor kid doesnt know he never had a chance

Uhhh correct me if I'm wrong but is it really NTR if she doesn't love or have a crush on haruta and having sex with the guy she actually likes/wants?
Chicks that look like that naturally gravitate toward da slut life.
Would love it if the tits aren't out of this world.

I'm guessing the NTR could be argued to be when Haruta, the MC, feels like he was being unfaithful in his big sis relationship and wanted to say I love you to Rio, not knowing she was already with some other guy? Ehh.. that's all I could understand if it could be considered even a little bit NTR. If you were to ask me, I wouldnt consider this an NTR, or if this were NTR, not a good one. But that's fine with me, I don't really enjoy NTR unless the MC finds a way to escape or get revenge (In a non gory way).

I enjoyed the story. But uh this isn't NTR at all, or even a little bit in my opinion. I wasn't searching up NTR content but I see people complaining about it not being necessarily an NTR and looked at the tags. It's just a shy kid named Haruta who didn't have the courage to shoot his shot and the girl ended falling for the other dude, and the other dude GAVE the option that him and the girl should stop having sex so he could return to Haruta. The girl says no. Her choice. The MC a pusssyyyyy. Anyways, it's nice simple story concept which I actually enjoyed. Once again, not NTR.
fucking rip. Little nigga never had a chance, considering she "belongs to the streets".
Can this really be considered Netorare?The MC and the girl may have a mutual attraction for each other but they're just friends. Plus the girl confessed to the 2nd guy and is fucking him.
A girl likes a guy but a man loves a women thats why the swim from cock to cock.

even though it's a ntr manga one thing is right about, how woman acts. when she doesn't sure her feelings she jumps to the cock, let herself to be manipulated etc. at last page she was literally disgusting. didn't even voice her feelings yet telling something like this. the guy is worst but the girl is way more.
